fantasia.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a piece of music that does not have a regular form or style
fantasia.translation[1].definitions[0].d: (1940) a US film made by Walt Disney, which consists of a number of different short cartoons, each one with its own piece of classical music. The conductor of the music is Leopold Stokowski, and the cartoons include one in which a group of hippopotamuses dance.
